description:
Fa goes missing, which prevents Kotone from focusing on work. Meanwhile, another quirky client arrives at RPG Real Estate. This time, it`s an elf, who lives longer than most houses can physically last.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Chouju no Onayami! Tonikaku Joubu de Nagaku Sumeru Ie, Kibou!
Woes of Longevity! I Need a Sturdy House That I Can Live in for a Long Time!
長寿のお悩み! とにかく丈夫で長く住める家, 希望!
